function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Problems around the opportunity costs of occupants spending 30 to 60 minutes filling in a questionnaire.","Impact":"Decreased productivity, increased frustration among occupants.","Mitigation":"Use technology to streamline the survey process, reduce the time required for filling in questionnaires.","Technologies":"Web-based survey tools, automation, AI-powered data collection and analysis.","People":"Building occupants.","Owner":"Building management or facility management."},{"Description":"Confounding factors such as industrial relations climate, staff morale, and personal issues influencing how occupants rate their workplace environment.","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased feedback, lack of actionable insights from occupant feedback.","Mitigation":"Implement transparent communication channels, address workplace issues, provide support to employees.","Technologies":"Employee engagement platforms, sentiment analysis tools, workplace culture assessment software.","People":"Building occupants, management, HR department.","Owner":"HR department, management."},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for complex multi-modal interactions that impact occupants in actual office buildings when assessing environmental conditions.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of building IEQ, unmet occupant needs, dissatisfaction.","Mitigation":"Use advanced environmental monitoring systems, sensor networks, and AI analytics to capture and analyze multi-modal interactions.","Technologies":"Sensor networks, IoT devices, AI analytics, environmental monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, building management.","Owner":"Facility management, environmental health and safety team."}]}
